/* Mapper - qaBoardList */ SELECT QANO, QAID, QATITLE, QACONTENT, QATYPE, QAANSWERTYPE, QASECRETYN, QAIMAGE, QAREF, QASTEP, TO_CHAR(QAINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QAINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(QAUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QAUPDATEDATE, QADELETEYN, TO_CHAR(QARECORDINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QARECORDINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(QARECORDUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QARECORDUPDATEDATE, QAREPLYCONTENT FROM TUQABOARD WHERE QADELETEYN = 'Y'
AND qaType LIKE '%'|| #{qasearchkeyword} ||'%'
AND qaTitle LIKE '%'|| #{qasearchkeyword} ||'%'
AND qaId LIKE '%'|| #{qasearchkeyword} ||'%'
AND( qaType LIKE '%'|| #{qasearchkeyword} ||'%' OR qaTitle LIKE '%'|| #{qasearchkeyword} ||'%' OR qaId LIKE '%'|| #{qasearchkeyword} ||'%' )
AND qaId = #{qaid}
ORDER BY QAREF DESC, QASTEP ASC

/* Mapper - qaBoardDetail */ SELECT QANO, QAID, QATITLE, QACONTENT, QATYPE, QAANSWERTYPE, QASECRETYN, QAIMAGE, QAREF, QASTEP, TO_CHAR(QAINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QAINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(QAUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QAUPDATEDATE, QADELETEYN, TO_CHAR(QARECORDINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QARECORDINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(QARECORDUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS QARECORDUPDATEDATE, QAREPLYCONTENT FROM TUQABOARD WHERE QADELETEYN = 'Y' AND QANO = #{qano}
mapper.update: /* Mapper - qaBoardUpdate */ UPDATE TUQABOARD SET QAID = #{qaid}, QATITLE = #{qatitle}, QACONTENT = #{qacontent}, QATYPE = #{qatype}, QAANSWERTYPE = #{qaanswertype}, QASECRETYN = #{qasecretyn}, QAIMAGE = #{qaimage}, QAUPDATEDATE = SYSDATE, QARECORDUPDATEDATE = SYSDATE, QAREPLYCONTENT = #{qareplycontent} WHERE QANO = #{qano} AND QADELETEYN = 'Y'
mapper.select: /* Mapper - qaBoardQaNoSelect */ (SELECT NVL2( MAX ( QANO ) , 'QA' || LPAD ( REPLACE ( MAX ( QANO ), 'QA' ) +1, 4, '0' ), 'QA0001' ) AS qano FROM TUQABOARD)
